meanings.sent1: Her impudicity was evident when she flaunted her new dress in front of everyone.
meanings.sent2: The impudicity of his behavior at the party shocked the guests.
meanings.sent3: Despite her impudicity, she managed to charm everyone with her wit and humor.
meanings.sent4: The impudicity of the politician's actions left the public speechless.
meanings.sent5: The impudicity of the cat as it paraded around with a stolen sock was both amusing and adorable.

meanings.sent1: The impudicity of his remarks made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: Her impudicity in dressing provocatively drew unwanted attention.
meanings.sent3: The impudicity of the situation was so absurd that it became comical.
meanings.sent4: His impudicity in asking for a raise after just a week of work was astounding.
meanings.sent5: The impudicity of the peacock's display of its feathers was a sight to behold.
